categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: TT4449 was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport employed by the Rebel Alliance to extract officers from the frigate Anvil which had been severely damaged and needed to be abandoned. Three X-wings, one of which piloted by Keyan Farlander, provided support and cover for the convoy of ships to escape to Hyperspace.
